antcolony
Class Item

java.lang.Object
  antcolony.Item

public class Item
extends java.lang.Object

The Item class represents an item of the dataset. The class stores all the data relevant for each instance, namely:

  • The item intrinsic data for each of the attributes of the current dataset.
  • Initial and current coordinates of the item on the grid.
  • If it is picked
  • The cluster in which the irem belongs
  • The maximum dissimilarity between items

Since:
1.0
Version:
1.8
Author:
António Fonseca
